DOC.brief_summary: The purpose protocol determine whether point care optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) image combine OCT-guided retinal referral algorithm primary diabetes care visit increase rate retina specialist eye care patient diabetic macular edema . The hypothesis OCT imaging automate OCT-guided referral algorithm enable identification patient risk vision loss diabetic macular edema facilitate direct referral retina specialist timely evaluation treatment .
DOC.brief_title: OCT Screening Diabetic Macular Edema Primary Diabetes Care Visits
DOC.criteria: Type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus evidence : Current regular use insulin oral antihyperglycemia agent treatment diabetes OR Documented diabetes American Diabetes Association and/or World Health Organization criterion Age great equal 18 year old Diabetes duration 10 year OR last measure HbA1c 10 % Able willing participate study procedure comply study followup visit Able give inform consent study participation Not move study area 1 year followup period Unable cooperate OCT image acquisition procedure study procedure Unable unwilling comply study followup visit Unable unwilling sign form release retinal medical record
